graphics.nim.volterra

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.nim.volterra.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Bounds bounds
      Contains the bounds of the screen.
      private Vector3f color
      The current color with which all shapes are drawn.
      private Font font
      The currently bound font with which text is drawn.
      private Vector3f fontColor
      The current color with which all text is drawn.
      private Matrix4f modelMatrix
      The current model matrix, this matrix is changed in order to transform sprites.
      private Matrix4f projMatrix
      The current projection matrix, this matrix can be changed with setBounds.
      private int quad
      The internal quad for drawing all on-screen sprites.
      private Shader shader
      The currently bound shader for drawing.
      private Matrix4f viewMatrix
      The current view matrix, this matrix can be changed by a Camera object.
      private static float Z_FAR 
      private static float Z_NEAR 
      private static float Z_RANGE

    • Method Detail

      • setShader

        public void setShader(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the currently bound shader for drawing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name under which the shader is stored in Resources.

      • setFont

        public void setFont(Font font)
        Sets the font with which all further text is drawn.
        Parameters:
        font - The font to use for text drawing.

      • init

        private void init()
        Sets the initial state of the canvas.

      • setClearColor

        public void setClearColor(float r,
                          float g,
                          float b)
        Sets the color the canvas is cleared to upon calling clear.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component of the color in the range [0-1].
        g - The green component of the color in the range [0-1].
        b - The blue component of the color in the range [0-1].

      • setColor

        public void setColor(float r,
                     float g,
                     float b)
        Sets the color with which further shapes are drawn.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component of the color in the range [0-1].
        g - The green component of the color in the range [0-1].
        b - The blue component of the color in the range [0-1].

      • setFontColor

        public void setFontColor(float r,
                         float g,
                         float b)
        Sets the color with which further text is drawn.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component of the color in the range [0-1].
        g - The green component of the color in the range [0-1].
        b - The blue component of the color in the range [0-1].

      • takeScreenshot

        public void takeScreenshot()
        Takes a screenshot of the current framebuffer.

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(float left,
                      float right,
                      float bottom,
                      float top)
        Sets the bounds of the screen.
        Parameters:
        left - The left boundary of the screen.
        right - The right boundary of the screen.
        bottom - The bottom boundary of the screen.
        top - The top boundary of the screen.

      • setCamera

        public void setCamera(Camera camera)
        Sets the camera with which the scene is rendered. Internally this method sets the viewMatrix member variable.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera with which to render the scene.

      • bindTexture

        public void bindTexture(int slot,
                        Texture texture)
        Binds a texture to an OpenGL texture slot. Internally this method makes the texture slot active before binding the given texture. The slot should be a constant integer instead of an OpenGL enum (0 instead of GL_TEXTURE0).
        Parameters:
        slot - The texture slot to bind the texture to.
        texture - The texture to bind.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the color and depth buffer

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect(float x,
                     float y,
                     float w,
                     float h)
        Draws a rectangle at position x,y with size w x h. The color of the rectangle can be set with setColor.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-component of the position of the rectangle.
        y - The y-component of the position of the rectangle.
        w - The width of the rectangle.
        h - The height of the rectangle.

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect(float x,
                     float y,
                     float d,
                     float w,
                     float h)
        Draws a rectangle at position x,y,d with size w x h. The color of the rectangle can be set with setColor.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-component of the position of the rectangle.
        y - The y-component of the position of the rectangle.
        d - The depth of the position of the rectangle.
        w - The width of the rectangle.
        h - The height of the rectangle.

      • drawImage

        public void drawImage(float x,
                      float y,
                      float depth,
                      Texture image)
        Draws a texture at position x,y with a given depth value.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-component of the position of the texture.
        y - The y-component of the position of the texture.
        depth - The depth of the position of the texture.
        image - The texture to be rendered.

      • drawImage

        public void drawImage(float x,
                      float y,
                      float depth,
                      Sprite sprite)
        Draws a sprite at position x,y with a given depth value.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-component of the position of the sprite.
        y - The y-component of the position of the sprite.
        depth - The depth of the position of the sprite.
        sprite - The sprite to be rendered.

      • drawString

        public void drawString(java.lang.String text,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       float depth,
                       float scale)
        Draws the specified string at position x,y and the specified depth
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be rendered.
        x - The x-component of the position of the text.
        y - The y-component of the position of the text.
        depth - The depth of the position of the text.
        scale - The scale with which to resize the text.
